spec.name: Al Seddiq Mosque
spec.description: Al Seddiq Mosque (Mosqu√©e Al Seddiq) is a local community mosque located in the heart of Casablanca, serving the daily religious needs of the surrounding neighborhood. It is a vital center for prayer, religious education, and community life in the area. Like most neighborhood mosques in Morocco, it features a distinctive minaret and traditional elements of Moroccan Islamic architecture, though its scale is generally smaller than the grand royal mosques.
